Sentence.string: Robert, you lied about your alibi. The United club closed two days ago. Unless you explain me where you were yesterday, I have to arrest you.
... - Robert doesn’t say anything and stares into space, in the direction of his drink.
Well, be prepared for the visit of policemen.
Wait detective White, I’ll tell you the truth… But you have to promise me that you won’t tell anything to my mother or my sister.

Ok… I’m not proud of it … but I started to drink a lot of alcohol several days ago… since I was told my father came back to London, it reopened an old wound… Actually I was on Darty street yesterday… at the Grey Cat… I was with a charming lady all the afternoon.
Could you give me her name in order that I confirm your alibi?

Her name ? Uh her name was… - he bursts into tears. Oh, I don’t remember, I’m so sorry… what a moron… I’m ashamed detective. I feel like I’m doing all what I reproached my father with, all of this because of him...
You didn’t insult or assault this poor lady, did you ?
Oh no detective, I could never do such a thing after what I lived. We just spoke about our respective lives.

Robert, try to get a grip on yourself. You’ve got everything into your hands not to reproduce what your father did. Your mother and your sister are relying on you. I have to leave you, now. I need to continue my investigations.
